channel.title: News on Network Science
channel.description: Recent content in News on Network Science

item.title: Job Update 2020
item.author: M.Smith3@napier.ac.uk (Matthew Smith)
item.description: I am very happy to annouce that I have joined Edinburgh Napier University as a Lecturer in Strategy. I hope to make a signifcant contribution to the group and continue my research on the application of social network analysis to economic and management topics.

item.title: Job Update
item.author: M.Smith3@napier.ac.uk (Matthew Smith)
item.description: In September 2018, I joined the University of Greenwich as a Lecturer in International Business (IB), after completing my postodc at the University of Oxford. I am part of the Centre for Business Network Analysis (CBNA), where I hope to make a signifcant contribution to the centre and continue my research on the application of social network analysis to economic areas.
